apis.description: APIs to retrieve list of bets and place a new bet

parameters.name: betId
parameters.description: Bet ID

parameters.name: memberToken
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be a valid token obtained from login API

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be the same user-id used for logging-in

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Header Parameter, a valid apiKey obtained via /apiKey API

errorResponses.reason: Any one of the above cases, use the errorCode attribute to handle it

operations.notes:
The bet data will be returned only if it was placed on a event that is not older than 21 days excluding today.

This API can be used to fetch the details of a bet placed via internet as well. Parlay bets are not supported.

List of error codes and messages given below:

errorCodeerrorMessage
100Required header parameters memberToken, userId and apiKey are either missing or invalid.
105Session time out or you have been logged out. Please re-login.
205No Bet Data exists for the given bet id. Either the Bet ID is invalid or the bet has been placed on a match held before 21 days or earlier.

Note: The response Content-Encoding will be gzip for all the Betting API responses, including this one.
operations.summary: Retrieves bet details by Bet ID

operations.notes:
It will return empty array if there are no pending bets found.

The response will include those bets placed via internet as well.

List of error codes and messages given below:

errorCodeerrorMessage
100Required header parameters memberToken, userId and apiKey are either missing or invalid.
105Session time out or you have been logged out. Please re-login.

Note: The response Content-Encoding will be gzip for all the Betting API responses, including this one.
operations.summary: Retrieves the list of bets pending for backoffice admin's approval.

apis.description: APIs to retrieve list of bets and place a new bet

parameters.name: selectionId
parameters.description: One of the marketSelectionId values returned by the Price Listing API

parameters.name: stake
parameters.description: Bet Amount to be placed

parameters.name: odds
parameters.description: Value of decimalOdds attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: handicap
parameters.description: Value of handicap attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: nativeOdds
parameters.description: Value of decimalOdds attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Value of currentScore attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId. Required only for bets on Live markets.

parameters.name: memberToken
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be a valid token obtained from login API

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be the same user-id used for logging-in

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Header Parameter, a valid apiKey obtained via /apiKey API

errorResponses.reason: Any one of the above cases, use the errorCode attribute to handle it

operations.notes:
This API won't accept in-running bets on a non-soccer match. Please use preparebet and confirmbet API for that.

Parlay bets are not supported. At one time only one bet is allowed.

The Content-Type must be application/x-www-form-urlencoded for this request.

List of error codes and messages given below:

errorCodeerrorMessage
100Required header parameters memberToken, userId and apiKey are either missing or invalid.
105Session time out or you have been logged out. Please re-login.
200Invalid Selection ID provided.
211Invalid native odds
BALYour Bet Credit is insufficient to place this bet.
MBTR0598Market updating. Please try again.
MB0501Stake amount is less than minimum bet amount
MB0502Stake amount is more than maximum bet amount
MBTR0503Stake amount is more than maximum bet amount per match
MT004Odds has changed
210To place in-running bets on a non-soccer match please use preparebet and confirmbet APIs.

Note: The response Content-Encoding will be gzip for all the Betting API responses, including this one.
operations.summary: Place a bet on a particuler market selection.

apis.description: APIs to retrieve list of bets and place a new bet

parameters.name: selectionId
parameters.description: One of the marketSelectionId values returned by the Price Listing API

parameters.name: stake
parameters.description: Bet Amount to be placed

parameters.name: odds
parameters.description: Value of decimalOdds attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: handicap
parameters.description: Value of handicap attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: nativeOdds
parameters.description: Value of decimalOdds attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Value of currentScore attribute in the Price Listing API for corresponding marketSelectionId. Required only for bets on Live markets.

parameters.name: memberToken
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be a valid token obtained from login API

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be the same user-id used for logging-in

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Header Parameter, a valid apiKey obtained via /apiKey API

errorResponses.reason: Any one of the above cases, use the errorCode attribute to handle it

operations.notes:
This is a special API to be used to place an in-running bet on a non-soccer match. It involves two steps listed below:

1. Call preparebet API with all necessary inputs. This will return an unique ID (called prepared bet id).
2. After obtaining the prepared bet id, immediately after 4 seconds (actual delay is indicated by the otherSportsLiveBetDelay attribute in the response of this API), call the confirmbet API with the prepared bet id. This will complete the bet placement process.

Please note if the match is not in-running state or the match is paused, then this API will automatically call confirmbet API and return the response (refer the confirmbet API JSON response). The client need not to execute another call to confirmbet API in that case.

Parlay bets are not supported. At one time only one bet is allowed.

The Content-Type must be application/x-www-form-urlencoded for this request.

List of error codes and messages given below:

errorCodeerrorMessage
100Required header parameters memberToken, userId and apiKey are either missing or invalid.
105Session time out or you have been logged out. Please re-login.

Note: The response Content-Encoding will be gzip for all the Betting API responses, including this one.
operations.summary: Returns an unique ID which is needed by the confirmbet API

apis.description: APIs to retrieve list of bets and place a new bet

parameters.name: preparedBetId
parameters.description: Value of preparedBetId - obtained via /preparebet API.

parameters.name: memberToken
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be a valid token obtained from login API

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Header Parameter, must be the same user-id used for logging-in

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Header Parameter, a valid apiKey obtained via /apiKey API

errorResponses.reason: Any one of the above cases, use the errorCode attribute to handle it

operations.notes:
This API cannot be used directly. Please call the preparebet API first before calling this API. Read the prepare bet API description above for more info.

The Content-Type must be application/x-www-form-urlencoded for this request.

List of error codes and messages given below:

errorCodeerrorMessage
100Required header parameters memberToken, userId and apiKey are either missing or invalid.
105Session time out or you have been logged out. Please re-login.
200Invalid Selection ID provided.
211Invalid native odds
BALYour Bet Credit is insufficient to place this bet.
MBTR0598Market updating. Please try again.
MB0501Stake amount is less than minimum bet amount
MB0502Stake amount is more than maximum bet amount
MBTR0503Stake amount is more than maximum bet amount per match
MT004Odds has changed
208It is too early to call confirmbet followed by preparebet API. Please wait for 4 seconds before calling confirmbet API.
209The preparedBetId has been expired.
207Prepared bet id not found. Please call preparebet API to obtain a valid prepared bet id.

Note: The response Content-Encoding will be gzip for all the Betting API responses, including this one.
operations.summary: Completes the bet placement process initiated by the preparebet API call

values:

  • Pending
  • Cancelled

/outcome API will return one of the following status:
